alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 21 at 9:06PM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Northern Sioux County. In Wyoming, South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST Thursday morning through 11 PM MST Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
